apis.description: Return the config information for the Kaltura plugin in json format.

operations.notes: Return the config information for the Kaltura plugin in json format.

response_fields.name: enabled
response_fields.description: Enabled state of the Kaltura plugin

response_fields.name: domain
response_fields.description: Main domain of the Kaltura instance (This is the URL where the Kaltura API resides)

response_fields.name: resources_domain
response_fields.description: Kaltura URL for grabbing thumbnails and other resources

response_fields.name: rtmp_domain
response_fields.description: Hostname to be used for RTMP recording

response_fields.name: partner_id
response_fields.description: Partner ID used for communicating with the Kaltura instance

apis.description:
Start a new Kaltura session, so that new media can be recorded and uploaded
to this Canvas instance's Kaltura instance.

operations.notes:
Start a new Kaltura session, so that new media can be recorded and uploaded
to this Canvas instance's Kaltura instance.

response_fields.name: ks
response_fields.description:
The kaltura session id, for use in the kaltura v3 API.
This can be used in the uploadtoken service, for instance, to upload a new
media file into kaltura.
